content.title: Transparency and Oversight In Energy Governance
content.cta: Scroll, tab or use your keyboard to move ahead

content.text: This chapter explores the role of appropriate and independent oversight in energy governance, ensuring transparency, accountability, and integrity in policy implementation. It highlights the importance of internal and external oversight mechanisms, including independent audits and regulatory scrutiny, to prevent fraud, enhance efficiency, and build public trust. The chapter also introduces agile oversight, emphasizing flexibility, responsiveness, and continuous monitoring to adapt to evolving energy challenges. Additionally, gender lens oversight and gender audits are discussed as essential tools for integrating gender equality into energy policies and governance structures. By leveraging oversight strategies, digital tools, and inclusive frameworks, this chapter underscores the need for strong governance systems to support a just and equitable energy transition.
